Question: Intuition Robotics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Intuition Robotics

ElliQ 3

- Third-generation eldercare companion robot
- Utilizes generative AI for engaging conversations and personalized experiences
- Smaller, lighter design with integrated screen
- Offers activities tailored to user interests
- Proactive in promoting cognitive and social wellness
- Partnered with government services and healthcare ecosystem
- Recognized as the Best of Yet to Come Award at CES 2024
- Received the Best of CES Award from Reviewed
- Equipped with guardrail mechanisms for real-time conversation mediation
